Package tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Viewmodel.AuthHandler

Class LoginHandler

java.lang.Object
tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Viewmodel.AuthHandler.LoginHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseAuthSubscriber
public class LoginHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseAuthSubscriber
LoginHandler is Controller Design Pattern to achieve MVVM Design on authentication actions.
Author:
Kaan Turkmen

      email - Email address of the player.
      verificationCode - Verification code of the player.
      newPassword - New password of the user.

      Returns:

    • loginResponseArrived

      public void loginResponseArrived​(Player player, java.lang.Integer databaseResponse)
      A method for Observer Design Pattern to be called by the database when results are arrived.
      Specified by:
      loginResponseArrived in interface DatabaseAuthSubscriber
      Parameters:
      player - Player instance from the database.
      databaseResponse - Database response indicating the operation's success or failure.
